affected_services: Broadband, Mobile, Facebook, Facebook and Facebook Messenger, Facebook, Messenger
Facebook, Facebook, Facebook Messenger, Instagram, Signal, Telegram, WhatsApp, X (Formerly Twitter), YouTube

Bangladesh imposed a near-total Internet shutdown on July 18, 2024, to quell protests over discriminatory quotas in government jobs. Internet access was partially restored on July 23, 2024, although social media platforms remained blocked.
